Article.ArticleTitle: Molecular Research on Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis.

Abstract.AbstractText: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS) is a rare, progressive, lethal, and degenerative disease of motor neurons for which there is no treatment currently available [...].

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Biomedicine, Neurosciences and Advanced Diagnostics, Institute of Clinical Biochemistry, Clinical Molecular Medicine and Clinical Laboratory Medicine, University of Palermo, 90127 Palermo, Italy.
